fields.Title of Presentation: <span><span style="font-size:10pt;background-color:transparent;">Finding the Balance of Empathy and Integrity in Education</span></span>
fields.Conference / Meeting Name: FIND (Faculty Innovation & Network Development) Mixer: Symmetry, Pattern, Transformation, Balance
fields.Sponsoring Organization: Center for Research and Creative Activity - Division of Research and Economic Development
fields.Description/Abstract: This poster introduces Kate Conley as a scholar at Boise State University who values empathy, integrity, and connection. Katie's work includes introducing students to special education, supporting emerging and veteran teachers out in schools, and guiding the field of education to implement positive social, emotional, and behavioral supports to create welcoming learning environments. Future aspirations include fostering empathy in Higher Education, strengthening the integrity of evidence-supported practices through systems and data, and connecting students through experiential learning.
